message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I know it's worth a lot to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking of making a counteroffer of $12,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm still hoping to get a little closer to my asking price. How about $13,500? That's a fair compromise, and still well below what the product is worth to you.
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll counteroffer at $13,000. That's the best I can do.
